original_title: New inter-city express train from Mt. Lavinia to Kankasanturai
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – A new inter-city express train from Mt. Lavinia to Kankasanturai has been put into operation since Friday night. (04)
Railways Deputy General Manager (Traffic) M. J. Indipolage said that this train named 'Yal nila' will run from Mt. Lavinia to Kankasanturai every Friday at 10 pm.
Smilarly. every Sunday at 9.30 p.m., there will be a train journey from Kankasanthurai to Mt. Lavinia.
Railways Deputy General Manager (Traffic) M. J. Indipolage said that the train is scheduled to run daily after the 18th of August, in conjunction with the Nallur Kovil festival season.
BREAKING: Imran Khan jailed for 3 years and banned from politics for 5 years
